DOC.brief_title: Ideal Dose Phenylephrine Treat Low Blood Pressure During Cesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine minimum effective bolus dose phenylephrine prevent post-spinal hypotension CS 95 % patient . The study conduct randomized double-blinded fashion . This dose-response study conduct per up-down sequential allocation method , modify Narayana rule , design cluster result around ED95 . Blood pressure monitor every minute intrathecal injection delivery child . Phenylephrine administer every time blood pressure equal low control value.Hypotension define SBP le 80 % baseline value , case treatment failure . Hypertension define SBP 120 % baseline value . If patient present hypertension two consecutive measurement , case consider drop out.An adequate response define absence hypotension nausea/vomiting period induction spinal anesthesia uterine incision prior fetal delivery . The result study define minimum effective dose phenylephrine prevent post-spinal hypotension nausea/vomiting secondary hypotension Cesarean section , thus optimize safety profile respect maternal fetal side effect vasopressor .
